content:
Informazioni utili da fornire nelle richieste al forum:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)
creator: @next

content: Cosa vuoi scaricare e da dove lo stai scaricando?
creator: @next

content: I think that's where the MS Store version of Thunderbird stores the profile, so nothing wrong in that regard if that's the version of Thunderbird you're using. I think I saw that mentioned in some KB article, but cannot find it now, all I can find are references to that in other threads on various forumsâ€¦
creator: DavidGG

content:
What type of account is this (POP, IMAP)? What are your settings for When I delete a message in the account Server Settings?

What do you mean you set it to "Do not delete" a thousand times? What setting are you referring to, the one in Synchronization & Storeag or what? And why would you do that more than once? Does the setting not stick or what?
creator: DavidGG

content: Il nome utente e la password che usi per consultare la casella di posta elettronica che vuoi usare in Thunderbird.
creator: @next

content: We need more information before we can offer suggestions. Was this a transfer from another computer? A system crash?
creator: davidsk

content: - create a csv export from thunderbird so you have a model to follow - in excel, adjust the columns to use the same first row as in the model csv file - save in csv format - import to thunderbird
creator: davidsk
